description.original: Change the colors, fonts and features of Minimal Theme.
description.translation: Change the colors, fonts and features of Minimal Theme.

dict..log(\"Unloading Minimal Theme Settings: .log("卸载 Minimal Theme Settings 插件")
dict.name:\"Cycle between dark mode styles\": name:"在深色模式样式之间切换"
dict.name:\"Cycle between light mode styles\": name:"在多种浅色模式样式之间切换"
dict.name:\"Cycle between table width options: name:"在表格宽度选项之间切换"

dict.name:\"Cycle between chart width options: name:"在图表宽度选项之间切换"
dict.name:\"Cycle between map width options\": name:"在地图宽度选项之间切换"
dict.name:\"Use light mode (low contrast)\": name:"使用浅色模式（低对比度）"
dict.name:\"Use light mode (high contrast)\": name:"使用浅色模式（高对比度）"
dict.name:\"Use dark mode (low contrast)\": name:"使用深色模式（低对比度）"

dict..setDesc(\"Level of contrast between sid: .setDesc("侧边栏与主要内容之间的对比度级别。")
dict..setDesc(\"Navigation items in the left: .setDesc("左侧边栏中的导航项目使用文本标签。")
dict..setDesc(\"The top area of the app uses: .setDesc("应用程序顶部区域使用您的强调色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Active file and menu items us: .setDesc("活动文件和菜单项使用您的强调色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Headings use a different colo: .setDesc("不同大小的标题使用不同的颜色。")
dict..setDesc(\"Use ellipses to fit file name: .setDesc("使用省略号使文件名显示在单行上。")
dict..setDesc(\"Display divider lines between: .setDesc("在工作区元素之间显示分隔线。")
dict..setDesc(\"Hide tab bar and status bar,: .setDesc("隐藏标签栏和状态栏，悬停即可显示。可以通过快捷键切换。")
dict..setDesc(\"Turn consecutive images into: .setDesc("将连续的图片排成列——要创建新行，请在图片之间添加一个额外的换行符。")
dict..setDesc(\"Used for text in the sidebars: .setDesc("用于侧边栏和标签中的文本（默认13）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Percentage of space inside a: .setDesc("窗格内部线条可填充的空间百分比（默认88）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Overrides the text font defin: .setDesc("在编辑模式下，覆盖 Obsidian 外观设置中定义的文本字体。")
